containers.name: busybox
command: sleep 2; kubectl delete job release-name-stash-community-crd-installer -n default || true; kubectl delete functions.stash.appscode.com update-status pvc-backup pvc-restore || true; kubectl delete tasks.stash.appscode.com pvc-backup pvc-restore || true;
